content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Haoyu Wang from China. He was interested in renting the apartment I had for rent in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment. We negotiated the price until we reached an agreement that was satisfactory for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[response]
[Answer]
[Response]
The final price we agreed upon was 500 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[response]
[Answer]
[Response]
I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as a 7. He was respectful, persistent, and clear in his communication.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[response]
[Answer]
[Response]
I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
